mapper.select: SELECT a.poSeq ,a.poRegDate ,a.poModDate ,a.poDelNy ,b.poAccount ,c.productName ,c.productPrice ,c.productTypeCd ,d.memberName ,d.memberTypeCd FROM placingOrder a LEFT JOIN poProduct b on a.poSeq = b.poSeqF LEFT JOIN product c on b.productSeqF = c.productSeq LEFT JOIN member d on a.memberSeqF = d.memberSeq

SELECT a.poSeq ,a.poRegDate ,a.poModDate ,a.poDelNy ,b.poAccount ,c.productName ,c.productPrice ,c.productTypeCd ,d.memberName ,d.memberTypeCd FROM placingOrder a LEFT JOIN poProduct b on a.poSeq = b.poSeqF LEFT JOIN product c on b.productSeqF = c.productSeq LEFT JOIN member d on a.memberSeqF = d.memberSeq WHERE poSeq = #{poSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE placingOrder set poDelNy = 1 WHERE poSeq = #{poSeq}
